p: Human dermal fibroblast cultures were established from patients, after approval, undergoing breast reduction surgery (Plastic Surgery Department, University Hospital, Uppsala, Sweden), as described [ 44], and used between passages 6â€“10. Cells were grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM; Sigma-Aldrich, Cat. No. D5796, St. Louis, MO, USA) containing 10% or 0.5% (under starvation) fetal bovine serum (FBS; Biowest, Biotech-IgG AB, Sweden).
